Judul: HOW INDUSTRY 4.0 IMPACT INDONESIA LOGISTICS SECTOR
Abstrak:
Industrial sectors have been subjected to a high degree of technological disruptions due to the
accelerated digitalisation of the economy, which has resulted in dramatic market shifts.
According to research, implementing modern innovations, such as industry 4.0 innovations,
makes businesses more efficient. This research aims to see whether Industry 4.0 has a minor or
significant influence on Indonesia's logistics industry.
Based on a review of the literature on Industry 4.0 and the Indonesian logistics industry, a case
study is conducted. Unfortunately, due to time constraints, the research will only focus on one
prominent logistic firm in Indonesia, PT. Sukma Putra Sarana. The study case will include an
interview with PT. Sukma Putra Sarana and the innovator of technologies, PT. Sati Akbar
Solusindo, as well as a review of PT. Sukma Putra Sarana operational data.
